review: Love my Fire stick!  I was expecting to have trouble getting started with it but within 10 minutes I was up and running.  Best present ever!!
author: Mary E. Williams

review: the WiFi remote is very fast and responsive. the processing power is less so.
author: Mitchell Tai

review: Fire TV Stick has been great for the most part.  Only issue has been with delays/intermittent pausing of videos.
author: Kyle Kilcherman

review: Great device!  Easy to set up,  easy to use and the Android Fire stick app works great with it as well. Definitely a great product!!
author: Peter J Mitros

review: Great device.. I also have the fire phone so it syncs everything from my phone except the apps.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it... but I got it for the $28 sale going on initially.  Wish I got more for that price.  if I was going to spend $50 for a new one.. I would just consider the bigger Fire TV.. with the better remote.All in all... great product.  Just wish more apps worked with it.  Time will tell I guess.  I was hoping the Slingblade app would let my DISH programing come to the TV, but sadly DISH is not supported.  They want you to get a Joey I guess.
author: Neofactor
